text: Ara tadera ceye bara yalema ke hate pare, yara allahara prati mithyaropa kare. Esaba lokake tadera palanakartara saksata sam'mukhina kara habe ara saksigana balate thakabe, era'i aisaba loka, yara tadera palanakartara prati mithyaropa karechila. Sune rakha, yalemadera upara allahara abhisampata rayeche.
